Hunger of Hadar Information

Description: Creatures within this black sphere are Blinded and take damage at the end of their turn and the start of their turn. Creatures starting their turn in the area take 2~12 Cold damage. Creatures ending their turn in the area possibly take 2~12 Acid damage. The area is Difficult Terrain. Level: Lvl 3 spell S
